Class BookingandPaymentController

java.lang.Object
controller.BookingandPaymentController
public class BookingandPaymentController
extends java.lang.Object
This class contains static methods to handle booking and payment

    • createNewBooking

      public static void createNewBooking​(java.util.Date booking_dt, Movie movie, Show show, java.util.ArrayList<Seat> seats, java.lang.String TID, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String mobileNumber, java.lang.String emailID) throws java.io.IOException
      This method creates a new booking and write it to the file
      Parameters:
      booking_dt - The date of booking
      movie - The selected movie
      show - The selected showtime
      seats - The list of selected seats
      TID - The transaction ID
      name - The name of customer
      mobileNumber - The mobile number of customer
      emailID - The email of customer
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - when file not found

    • calculateTicketPrice

      public static double calculateTicketPrice​(java.util.ArrayList<Seat> seats, Show show, Cinema cinema)
      This method calculates the ticket price and return it
      Parameters:
      seats - The list of selected seats
      show - The selected showtime
      cinema - The cinema showing
      Returns:
      The price of ticket

    • getAllBooking

      public static java.util.ArrayList<Booking> getAllBooking()

      Returns:
      The list of booking
